sentence.Network_en: Located in Languedoc - Roussillon , South of France. Selection of the best Foncalieu's vineyards Aude Department.
sentence.Network_cn: 位于法国南部的朗格多克地区. 葡萄精选自枫花堡葡萄园中最好的葡萄.

sentence.Network_en: Languedoc - Roussillon, South of France. It grows on sunny chalky clay soils and benefits from Mediterranean climate.
sentence.Network_cn: 位于法国南部朗格多克地区. 生长于白垩黏土之中,享受着温煦的阳光,得益于地中海式的气候.

sentence.Network_en: The Roussillon harvest was small this year, but reportedly of excellent quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 据报道鲁西荣地区今年收成不多品质却极好.

means.word_mean: 1. a region in south central France; named after the medieval dialect of French that was spoken there

auth_sentence.content: Languedoc-Roussillon's white wines have also shifted up a gear in quality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Languedoc-Roussillon's white wines have also shifted up a gear in quality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Languedoc-Roussillon's white wines have also shifted up a gear in quality.

auth_sentence.content: I'm a Brit working for a large wine cooperative in the Languedoc.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm a Brit working for a large wine cooperative in the Languedoc.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm a Brit working for a large wine cooperative in the Languedoc.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, Languedoc-Roussillon isn't your normal holiday destination, but car-hire glitch aside, that's what makes it so special.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, Languedoc-Roussillon isn't your normal holiday destination, but car-hire glitch aside, that's what makes it so special.
